text: Renpet Mons is a large shield volcano, located on the eastern portion of a ridge-belt province on Venus.Large Venusian Shields: Characterization and Comparisons It has a diameter of and is the source for massive lava flows overlying the Snegurochka Planitia plain.Geologic Mapping Of The North Polar Region Of Venus (V1-Snegurochka Planti-TIA): Implications For The Evolution Of Volcanic Activity ==References== Category:Shield volcanoes Category:Volcanoes of Venus Category:Mountains on Venus
title: Renpet Mons
